about: To guide the documentation of field observations for the study. 
labels: "disability-benenfits,research" 
assignees: ''

---

### Description
This ticket covers documenting field observations for the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. 

Field observations are a high-level, top-of-mind summary of things that stood out in the sessions, but is not the final result of working with the research data. The information in this document may change following a deeper data review and analysis.

The goal of this document is to:
- To align observers on stand-out observations from research sessions
- To gain insight from team leads and determine specific directions to pursue as we analyze the data
- To jumpstart analysis by quickly organizing high-level themes

#### Timeframe for this ticket
This document should be turned around quickly and not labored over. Shouldnâ€™t take half a sprint to produce.

#### Output
[Add link when it's ready. Note status (in progress/final).]

### Tasks
- [ ] Write a summary of top-of-mind observations, using [this template](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/blob/master/platform/research/sharing-research/field-observations-template.md) as a starting point
- [ ] Share with HCD lead, PM, enablement team UX Lead and observers so they have the opportunity to provide feedback or additional areas of focus for analysis

### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] HCD lead, PM, observers, and enablement team UX lead have shared any feedback or questions
- [ ] Any feedback implemented, and reviewed document exists in GitHub research folder and linked in the ReadMe
